DELAY_TO_START - Static variable in class global.CVMGlobalTest
delay before starting the test scenarios, leaving time to build and initialise the components and their simulators.
DELAY_TO_START_IN_MILLIS - Static variable in class equipments.HEM.CVMIntegrationTest
 
DELAY_TO_START_SIMULATION - Static variable in class global.CVMGlobalTest
delay to start the real time simulations on every model at the same moment (the order is delivered to the models during this delay; this delay must be ample enough to give the time to notify all models of their start time and to initialise them before starting, a value that depends upon the complexity of the simulation architecture to be traversed and the component deployment (deployments on several JVM and even more several computers require a larger delay.
